column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Ordered stuffed pizza with sausage
column5: but I'd probably get it in traditional deep dish format rather than as a stuffed pizza next time. Was here with 3 others; had a medium pizza
column6: which we did not finish. Others in the party (from NYC) hated the stuffed pizza so they had like half a slice
column7: meaning there were lots of leftovers. Overall
column8: I think this is a bit better than Uno...Want to try Pequod's next time.
